00040 class TestRequestPacket : public RequestPacket {
00041    public:
00045       TestRequestPacket(uint32 mapID, uint32 sendTime,
00046                         uint32 ip, uint16 port);
00047 
00051       virtual ~TestRequestPacket();
00052 
00054       enum timetype_t
00055       {
00056          // Set when the packet is sent from the server.
00057          TIMETYPE_SERVERSEND = 0,
00058          
00059          // Set when the leader reader recieves the packet.
00060          TIMETYPE_LEADERRECIEVE,
00061          
00062          // Set when the leader distributes the packet.
00063          TIMETYPE_LEADERSEND,
00064          
00065          // Set when the available reader recieves the packet.
00066          TIMETYPE_READRECIEVE,
00067          
00068          // Set when the reader enqueues the packet.
00069          TIMETYPE_READSEND,
00070          
00071          // Set when the processor dequeues the packet.
00072          TIMETYPE_PROCRECIEVE,
00073          
00074          // Set when the processor creates the replypacket
00075          TIMETYPE_PROCESSDONE  // =6
00076       };
00077       
00078 
00082       void setTime(uint32 time);
00083 
00087       uint32 getTime(timetype_t type) const;
00088 
00089       void setModuleNbr(uint32 moduleNbr);
00090 
00091       uint32 getModuleNbr() const;
00092       
00093       
00094 };
